headline: Roper Technologies, Inc. (ROP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Roper Technologies, Inc. (ROP) on FluentinQuality’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ROP. Roper Technologies, Inc. (ROP)’s share was trading at $572.18 as of 10th June. ROP’s trailing and forward P/E were 41.32 and 28.82 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Roper Technologies may still carry […]
